scripts.build:vendors-react:dev: browserify                                                              -r react -r react-dom -r prop-types -r hoist-non-react-statics -r classnames                       -o vendors/js/vendors-react.js
scripts.build:vendors-react:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production                                   browserify                                                              -r react -r react-dom -r prop-types -r hoist-non-react-statics -r classnames                       -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o vendors/js/vendors-react.min.js
scripts.build:vendors:list: browserify                                                              -r react -r react-dom -r prop-types -r hoist-non-react-statics -r classnames                       --list | node scripts/depsReporter.js
scripts.build:dev-box-ui-react-components-no-dep: browserify   -r ./src/lib/react-components/:dev-box-ui-react-components -x react -x react-dom -x prop-types -x hoist-non-react-statics -x classnames                       --debug -o build/dist/js/dev-box-ui-react-components-no-deps.js

cross-env NODE_ENV=production        browserify   -r ./src/lib/react-components/:dev-box-ui-react-components -x react -x react-dom -x prop-types -x hoist-non-react-statics -x classnames                       -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o build/dist/js/dev-box-ui-react-components-no-deps.min.js

browserify   -r ./src/lib/react-components/:dev-box-ui-react-components -x react -x react-dom -x prop-types -x hoist-non-react-statics -x classnames                       --list | node scripts/depsReporter.js
scripts.build:dev-box-ui-react-components-with-d: cross-env NODE_ENV=production      browserify   -r ./src/lib/react-components/:dev-box-ui-react-components -x react -x react-dom                                                                              -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o build/dist/js/dev-box-ui-react-components-with-deps.min.js
scripts.build:dev-box-ui-web-components:dist:pro: cross-env NODE_ENV=production                  browserify   -r ./src/lib/web-components:dev-box-ui-web-components                                                                                                          -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o build/dist/js/dev-box-ui-web-components.min.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:vendors-react:dev && npm run build:vendors-react:prod && npm run build:dev-box-ui-react-components-no-deps:dist:dev && npm run build:dev-box-ui-react-components-no-deps:dist:prod && npm run build:dev-box-ui-react-components-with-deps:dist:dev && npm run build:dev-box-ui-react-components-with-deps:dist:prod && npm run build:dev-box-ui-web-components:dist:dev && npm run build:dev-box-ui-web-components:dist:prod && npm run build:babel:src:release
scripts.clean: rimraf build/dist/js/* && rimraf build/src/* && rimraf vendors/js/*
